overview.title: Gabriel Pimentel
overview.subtitle: Software Developer
overview.detail: Adding value to the world through smart solutions

about_valuable_features.title: Focus on value
about_valuable_features.description: I create high valuable features based on continuous deliveries and validations with client, focusing on company business core.

about_clean_code.title: Clean code
about_clean_code.description: Well-structured applications with scalable design and flexible code.

about_learning.title: Constant learning
about_learning.description: “I may not know the answer, but I know how to find it, and I will find it.” — Adapted from The Pursuit of Happyness

about_tests.title: Unit testing
about_tests.description: Reliable code is tested code. I treat tests as part of the development process.

about_ux.title: UX/UI best practices
about_ux.description: Design and usability are as important as functionality—good experiences matter.

about_principles.title: Principles over technologies
about_principles.description: Trends fade, but engineering principles remain.

inspector.name: Delfos Inspector
inspector.description: Offline app for filling out inspection checklists.

axis.name: Axis
axis.description: Offline app for pilots, focused on flight registration.

vowe.name: Vowe Air
vowe.description: App for scheduling flights within a monthly hour package.

technologist_systems_analysis_developmen.title: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development
technologist_systems_analysis_developmen.subtitle: FATEC da Zona Leste (2019-2022)
technologist_systems_analysis_developmen.course_conclusion: TCC: an application based on psychological help, which connects volunteers to anonymous people with psychological problems.
technologist_systems_analysis_developmen.certificate: I received a certificate of excellence for my performance in the course.

english.title: English Course
english.subtitle: FISK Centro de Ensino (2018-2020)
english.course_conclusion: MET (level B2): I improved my English skills, which allowed me to pass the MET (Michigan English Test).

technician_systems_development.title: Technician in Systems Development
technician_systems_development.subtitle: ETEC da Zona Leste (2018 - 2019)
technician_systems_development.course_conclusion: TCC: an application for tabletop RPG sessions.
technician_systems_development.certificate: I received a certificate of excellence for my performance in the class.
